g.text: A Complete SMTP/POP3 Client-Server System with SSL/TLS Security
Course Project: CS3611 Computer Networks | Student: Lin Deng Kang Wu Song
‚úÖ RFC Compliant | ‚úÖ Multi-threaded | ‚úÖ Base64 MIME Support
Client Interface Layer (CLI + Optional Web UI)
‚Ä¢ Advanced network programming with socket-level protocol implementation
‚Ä¢ Multi-threaded server architecture and concurrent programming patterns
‚Ä¢ Cryptographic security implementation (TLS handshake, certificate validation)
‚Ä¢ Database integration and efficient data persistence strategies
‚Ä¢ RFC compliance and internet standards implementation methodology
CS3611 Computer Networks | Final Project Poster | Academic Year 2025-2026
Demonstrates practical application of network protocols, concurrent programming, database integration, and secure communication
